description: Introduction to AI ethics, covering bias, privacy, and transparency.
learning_objectives: Identify ethical concerns in AI development
Address ethical concerns in AI implementation

mcqs.question: What is the primary goal of AI ethics?
Which of the following is an example of an ethical concern in AI development?

flashcards.back: The tendency of an AI system to produce unfair or discriminatory outcomes
The ability to understand and interpret the decisions made by an AI system

generated_text:
"Module 38: Ethics" (50min, Beginner) 
Introduction to AI ethics, covering bias, privacy, and transparency. Learn to identify and address ethical concerns in AI development and implementation. Interactive examples and case studies illustrate key concepts, providing a foundation for responsible AI practice.
